AT.name: Bomberman™ 64
AT.description: Wie viele Jobs gibt es schon, bei denen man dafür bezahlt wird, mit Bomben um sich zu werfen, um alles vor sich aus dem Weg zu sprengen? Der böse Altair hat die Kontrolle über den Omni Cube an sich gerissen, der seinem Besitzer die ungeheure Macht des Universums verleiht, und es liegt an Bomberman, den Omni Cube zurückzuholen. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Bomberman™ 64
AU.description: How many jobs are there out there where one gets paid to toss bombs around, blowing up everything in your path? The evil Altair has wrested control of the Omni Cube (which allows its holder to possess the tremendous power of the universe), and it's up to Bomberman to get it back. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Bomberman™ 64
BG.description: How many jobs are there out there where one gets paid to toss bombs around, blowing up everything in your path? The evil Altair has wrested control of the Omni Cube (which allows its holder to possess the tremendous power of the universe), and it's up to Bomberman to get it back. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Bomberman™ 64
BE.description: Ce n'est pas tout le monde qui peut se vanter d'être payé à poser des bombes partout pour tout faire exploser sur son passage. Le diabolique Altair a pris le contrôle de l'Omni Cube (qui octroie à celui qui le possède le pouvoir colossal de l'univers), et c'est à Bomberman de tout faire pour le récupérer. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: Bomberman 64
CA.description: The evil Altair is using the Omni Cube to drain the energy from Planet Bomber. With the aid of a mysterious helper, you must defeat Altair, and restore peace to Planet Bomber. In the Adventure mode, guide Bomberman through twenty-four areas of perilous conflict. Battle Altair's sinister allies, destroy their bases, and put an end to the insane attack. The multi-player Battle mode offers endless explosive action!

CH.name: Bomberman™ 64
CH.description: Wie viele Jobs gibt es schon, bei denen man dafür bezahlt wird, mit Bomben um sich zu werfen, um alles vor sich aus dem Weg zu sprengen? Der böse Altair hat die Kontrolle über den Omni Cube an sich gerissen, der seinem Besitzer die ungeheure Macht des Universums verleiht, und es liegt an Bomberman, den Omni Cube zurückzuholen. ES.name: Bomberman™ 64
ES.description: ¿Te imaginas tener un empleo en el que te paguen por tirar bombas, haciendo que todo explote a tu paso? El malvado Altair ha tomado el control del Omni Cube (que da a su portador acceso al inconmensurable poder del universo) y recuperarlo está en manos de Bomberman. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Bomberman™ 64
IT.description: Quanti lavori conosci in cui vieni pagato per lanciare bombe e distruggere qualsiasi cosa sul tuo cammino? Il malvagio Altair ha preso il controllo dell'Omni Cube (che conferisce al suo possessore lo straordinario potere dell'universo), e tocca a Bomberman recuperarlo. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

LT.description: How many jobs are there out there where one gets paid to toss bombs around, blowing up everything in your path? The evil Altair has wrested control of the Omni Cube (which allows its holder to possess the tremendous power of the universe), and it's up to Bomberman to get it back. MT.name: Bomberman™ 64
MT.description: How many jobs are there out there where one gets paid to toss bombs around, blowing up everything in your path? The evil Altair has wrested control of the Omni Cube (which allows its holder to possess the tremendous power of the universe), and it's up to Bomberman to get it back. This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Bomberman 64
MX.description: El malvado Altair está utilizando el Omni Cubo para drenar toda la energía del Planeta Bomber. Con la ayuda de un misterioso compañero, debes vencer a Altair, y restaurar la paz del Planeta Bomber. En el modo aventura, guía a Bomberman hacia veinticuatro áreas. Combate a los siniestros aliados de Altair, destruye sus bases y pon fin a este ataque tan despiadado. ¡El modo multijugador ofrece un sinfín de acciones explosivas!

NO.name: Bomberman™ 64
NO.description: How many jobs are there out there where one gets paid to toss bombs around, blowing up everything in your path? The evil Altair has wrested control of the Omni Cube (which allows its holder to possess the tremendous power of the universe), and it's up to Bomberman to get it back. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Bomberman™ 64
NL.description: Hoeveel banen zijn er waarbij je betaald wordt om bommen in het rond te gooien, om alles in je pad op te blazen? De kwade Altair heeft de Omni Cube (die zijn eigenaar de ongekende kracht van het universum geeft) in zijn macht, en het is aan Bomberman om hem terug te krijgen. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Bomberman™ 64
NZ.description: How many jobs are there out there where one gets paid to toss bombs around, blowing up everything in your path? The evil Altair has wrested control of the Omni Cube (which allows its holder to possess the tremendous power of the universe), and it's up to Bomberman to get it back. This is the US version of the game.

PL.description: How many jobs are there out there where one gets paid to toss bombs around, blowing up everything in your path? The evil Altair has wrested control of the Omni Cube (which allows its holder to possess the tremendous power of the universe), and it's up to Bomberman to get it back. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Bomberman™ 64
PT.description: Quantos trabalhos existem em que te pagam para atirares bombas, fazendo explodir tudo no teu caminho? O malvado Altair obteve o controlo do Omni Cube (que confere ao seu portador o tremendo poder do Universo), e cabe ao Bomberman recuperá-lo. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Bomberman™ 64
RU.description: Вот так работа! Бросайте бомбы, подрывайте все на своем пути и получайте за это деньги! Зловещий Altair заполучил Omni Cube, который придает невероятной силы Вселенной любому, кто им владеет. Вернуть его сможет только Bomberman! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
